data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 17,952 believers in the country of Saint-Martin.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Saint-Martin
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the country of Saint-Martin that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Saint-Martin, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 40,800 people living in Saint-Martin through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Saint-Martin.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Saint-Martin and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Saint-Martin, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary:
the country of Saint-Martin has a population of 40,800.

We estimate Saint-Martin has 17,952 people who might know Jesus, 22,032 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 816 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
